cards.rules_text:
When this artifact enters, choose a color. Create a Tag token that is the chosen color. [i](It's an enchantment that is the chosen color and has “{1}, Sacrifice this enchantment: Add one mana of the chosen color.”)[/i]
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: It deals 3 damage to target creature.
cards.notes:
#colorless #common
!token White Tag;Blue Tag;Black Tag;Red Tag;Green Tag

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, each opponent exiles a card from their hand. Create a black Tag token. [i](It's a black enchantment with “{1}, Sacrifce this token: Add {B}”)[/i]

Menace
When this creature enters, take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with two defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]

Deathtouch
[i]Revolt[/i] — This creature enters with a +1/+1 counter if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
Whenever this creature attacks, target creature with power 2 or less gains deathtouch until end of turn.

When this creature enters, create a black Tag token. [i](It's a black enchantment with “{1}, Sacrifce this token: Add {B}”)[/i]
{B}{B}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Target opponent discards two cards. 
[i]Revolt[/i] — If a permanent you control left the battlefield this turn, you gain 2 life and that opponent loses 2 life.

Flash
When this artifact enters, target creature you don't control gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Attach this equipment to up to one target creature you control.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1}

Destroy target creature. If there's anarchy, Tune Out deals 1 damage to each other creature with the same controller. [i](There's anarchy if you attacked with three or more creatures or defeated a battle this turn.)[/i]

Take to the streets. [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with two defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]
Until end of turn, creatures you control that are attacking battles can't be blocked.

At the beginning of your end step, if there's anarchy, put your choice of a deathtouch, menace, or +1/+1 counter on this creature. [i](There's anarchy if you attacked with three or more creatures or defeated a battle this turn.)[/i]

{T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Crew 2 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

When this artifact enters, surveil 2. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)[/i]
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and “When this creature dies, take to the streets.” [i](Put the top card of your library on the battlefield face down with two defense counters. It's a battle protected by an opponent. When it's defeated, return it to its owner's hand.)[/i]

When this creature enters, if you cast it, return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If a card was put into an opponent's hand this way, that player discards a card.

Whenever another creature you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
When this creature dies, target player loses life equal to this creature's power.

Trample
Whenever you attack a battle, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that creature is attacking a battle, it gains trample until end of turn.

Whenever one or more enchantments you control enter, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Sacrifice this enchantment: Target creature you control with a counter on it gains indestructible until end of turn.

Deathtouch
Whenever another creature you control with power 2 or less enters, take to the streets. This ability triggers only once each turn.
